scripts.build:all: npm run format && concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:frontend" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.docker:build: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:up: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.docker:up:detached: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:up:no-strict: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.docker:up:no-strict:detached: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:down: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:logs: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml logs -f
scripts.docker:ssg:build: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:ssg:up: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.docker:ssg:up:detached: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:ssg:up:no-strict: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.docker:ssg:up:no-strict:detached: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:ssg:down: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:ssg:logs: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local-ssg docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml logs -f
scripts.caddy:up: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.caddy:up:no-strict: REACT_STRICT_MODE=false AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.caddy:down: AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=123456789012 COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml down --remove-orphans
scripts.caddy:down:force: docker rm -f backend-local frontend-local portfolio-caddy-local || true
scripts.caddy:restart: COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml up -d --force-recreate caddy-local
scripts.bareMetalDev:tabs: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd \"$(pwd)/backend\" && npm run dev"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd \"$(pwd)/frontend\" && npm run dev"'
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install" --names "root,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green"
scripts.migrate:all:dev:dry: npm run migrate:media:dev && npm run migrate:db:dev:dry
scripts.migrate:all:dev: npm run migrate:media:dev && npm run migrate:db:dev
scripts.migrate:all:prod:dry: npm run migrate:media:prod && npm run migrate:db:prod:dry
scripts.migrate:all:prod: npm run migrate:media:prod && npm run migrate:db:prod
